Text: Ane̩ kʼO̩badaya go de̩.
Go, omi ache kʼe̩ nya ef abo uche̩i-chi,
Eke ki dʼef e̩do̩-we̩ mʼe̩ du le.
Dagba e̩ ate̩gu tʼatate̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩te̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼamoji wʼugbo-we̩,
Go abu ku ma tejane̩ e̩wñ Iso̩,
Abo du kʼuwe̩ kpʼama jʼalu,
Jihofa kakini,
Tak e̩do̩ amagbiti-we̩ adakpu, O Teman,
Tod e̩wñ afuma kʼe̩ che o̩maye-we̩ Je̩ko̩b,
O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ dago ej udaba le̩,
I ma dukpe̩ kʼe̩ dago ago ofoo̩jo̩ o̩maye-we̩ o̩jo̩
I ma dukpe̩ kʼe̩ mugudu lʼalaku abo-mi iko uchobi-ma;
I ma dukpe̩ kʼe̩ dago ugwe̩ta o̩na
Todu o̩jo̩ e-Jihofa me̩ me̩ kʼi abʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du ma.
Todu alu kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ ñmo̩ oj uwo-mi kiafo̩-i,
Ama abo ku ma fʼo̩wo̩ tane̩ ajʼoj uwo Zayo̩n,
Oñ abo unyi Jeko̩b achʼuna,
Tak abo o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ane̩ uwo Iso̩,
Oñ ame̩namu ef o̩wo̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l-i
Amajadu amute̩gu wʼoj uwo Zayo̩n
